name: HOLO:SHOT
description:
4 modes. 4 strategies you cannot mess up. Destroy or outrun the holograms with your provided assets, if you receive any. Don't lose.

[READ]

The SFX may still play at full volume even if you turn it down, an error I can't seen to fix.

WEBGL Build will most likely be laggy. If it is unbearable, I suggest you download the windows version
